title: Sri Lanka has not requested financial support – IMF
content: The International Monetary Fund has said it is ready to discuss options with Sri Lanka if the government asks for financial support.The International Monetary Fund’s mission chief for Sri Lanka Masahiro Nozaki has told AFP that the government has not requested financial support.Finance minister Basil Rajapaksa recently said Sri Lanka had sought advice from the IMF and was considering seeking an international bailout.
